text: Vargas may refer to: ==People== * Vargas (surname) (including a list of people with this surname) * Getúlio Vargas, 14th and 17th President of Brazil ** Getúlio Vargas, Rio Grande do Sul, a Brazilian municipality * Vargas and Lagola, a Swedish songwriting, production and artist duo ** Vincent Pontare, professionally known as Vargas; Swedish songwriter, producer, and singer ==Places== * Vargas, Cantabria, Spain * Vargas (state), Venezuela ** Vargas Municipality ** Vargas tragedy, a natural disaster in 1999 ==Fictional characters== * Vargas (comics), a Marvel Comics character * Edgar Vargas, a character in Johnny the Homicidal Maniac * Rocco Vargas, a science-fiction comic-book series by Daniel Torres * Miguel Vargas, the character in the 1958 film Touch of Evil * Vargas, a boss from the game Final Fantasy VI * Vargas, a character from the game Uncharted 4: A Thief's End ==See also== * * Varga (disambiguation) * Varda (disambiguation)
title: Vargas
